useCase.name: Manage Categories

preconditions.precondition: The user must be logged in and have the necessary privileges.

successEndConditions.condition: The new category is successfully added to the system.

useCase.trigger: User selects the option to manage categories.

mainSequence.step: Assigned User selects "Categories" from the menu.
Category Repository shows the category menu to the Assigned User.
Category Repository requests data for the new category.
Assigned User enters the required data.
Category Repository validates the entered data.
Category Repository loads the new category.
Category Repository confirms the successful loading.
Assigned User receives a confirmation message.
